DOC.brief_summary: The present study is designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of fixed combination therapy of vildagliptin and metformin (25/1000 mg bid) in patients with type 2 diabetes inadequately controlled with prior metformin monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Fixed Combination Therapy of Vildagliptin and Metformin (25/1000 mg Bid) in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Inadequately Controlled With Prior Metformin Monotherapy (HbA1c 7.0-9.5%)
DOC.criteria: History of T2DM treated with Metformin FPG >= 260 mg/dL (14.4mmol/L) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
